import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // Add this import at the top import {useState} from "react" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { doSignInWithEmailAndPassword } from '../auth'; import { useAuth } from '../authContext'; const Login = (handleLogin) => { const [currentEmail, setCurrentEmail] = useState("") const [currentPassword, setCurrentPassword] = useState("") const [isSigningIn, setIsSigningIn] = useState(false) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(!isSigningIn){ setIsSigningIn(true) await doSignInWithEmailAndPassword(currentEmail, currentPassword) } handleLogin(currentEmail, currentPassword) navigate("/") } return (

Log in to your account

setCurrentEmail(e.target.value)} />
Forgot Password
setCurrentPassword(e.target.value)} />

Not a member?{' '} Register Now

); } export default Login;
